hero.title: Welcome to BetterUP
hero.subtitle: The volunteer run portal of the University of the Philippines Los Ba√±os. Find information, access university services, stay updated with the latest news about UPLB.

services.title: Popular Services
services.description: Access official university services quickly and easily. Find what you need for enrollment, academic records, campus services, and more.

footer.copyright: 2025 BetterLB.org - All content is public domain unless otherwise specified.

joinUs.stripSubtitle: Help build the future of the Philippines and governance through technology
joinUs.bannerSubtitle: Help build the future of the Philippines and governance through technology.

data.title: Real-Time Data Services
data.description: Access up-to-date information on weather conditions and foreign exchange rates across the Philippines.
data.weatherDescription: Get current weather conditions and forecasts for major cities across the Philippines. Plan your day with accurate temperature readings and weather alerts.
data.forexDescription: Track foreign exchange rates from Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP). Convert currencies and view historical rate trends for major world currencies.

promotion.philsysDescription: Register for your Philippine Identification System (PhilSys) ID card today. The national ID serves as a single government-issued identification document for all citizens.

government.title: University Administration of UPLB
government.description: Learn about the key offices, councils, and units that make up the University Administration of UPLB.
government.executiveDescription: Led by the Chancellor, responsible for implementing university policies, programs, and guidelines.
government.legislativeDescription: Composed of faculty representatives and administrators, responsible for academic policies and curriculum.
government.barangaysDescription: Academic colleges and residential units within the university, led by deans and directors who manage academic and student services.
government.departmentsDescription: Administrative departments and offices responsible for specific areas of university operations.
government.electedofficialsDescription: The appointed and elected leadership of the Executive and Academic bodies, responsible for policy implementation and governance.
government.directoryDescription: Find contact information for university officials, departments, and offices at all levels.
